Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO REAL PROPERTY TAXATION

Title: Clarifies the definition of "first building permit" for purposes of filing requirements to qualify for an abatement of tax payments for certain industrial and commercial properties located in the city of New York
Summary: Clarifies the definition of "first building permit" for purposes of filing requirements to qualify for an abatement of tax payments for certain industrial and commercial properties located in a city of one million or more persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 397 of the laws of 2017, amending the real property tax law, relating to the impact of late filings of abatement benefits, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
